body:
i.e. "Democrats are the real racists!"

Identity politics is clearly a winning strategy. What long lasting victory have conservatives had since 1960? That is around the time whites stopped advocating for the legitimate interests of white people, as a group. 

Leftists have gotten the Hart-Cellar Act, Desegregation, Affirmative Action, Massive increases in welfare, Roe v. Wade, among other things. The Overton window continues to shift to the left. They now have started to tear down statues and prep the country for the replacement of whites by declaring American history racist.

What exactly are 'conservatives' conserving by losing the country? If whites would admit that they, as a group, have legitimate interests then we would be able to combat the lefts tribalism with our own.

body:
I agree with most of what you're saying. The Left has been well organized and has effectively made more drastic changes in this country than the Right.

Where we disagree is the topic of desegregation. I feel segregation is the primary factor in the racism that we have left in this country. I've had black friends and been around black acquaintances my entire life. I'm not racist because was never segregated from people according to ethnicity. My grandmother on the other hand was racist. She was in her mid-60s when she told me she sat next to a black woman on a flight and was taken back by how kind the woman was. I think she even used the phrase "they're just like everyone else". My thinking was "no shit" but even at a young age I realized she was previously racist because she had no real contact with somebody with dark skin.

Likewise, Daryl Davis has made it a point to sit down at bars and talk with racists. Former Klan members come to the dude's house for dinner now. Many of them told Daryl that they were racist because they hadn't gotten to know any black people.

I'll always support desegregation. "Blacks" don't have an agenda. Black Americans are just as diverse as white Americans. To be blunt, any time you lump a large group of people together on a broad variable you're going to be wrong in your analysis.

Blacks might not have 'an agenda' but they do understand that they have legitimate interests, which is why they mostly vote the same.

body:
Much like Europeans who manipulated rival tribes into fighting each other during the Westward expansion, we have allowed "fellow whites" to stigmatize collective self-interest while they push conflict between various demographics. Meanwhile, both sides until very recently have had their controllers funnelling resources and protection for a certain nation that is allowed to practice all they advocate against for America. But lately the far left has become unruly (thanks largely to the Muslims they imported to destabilize White America) and hence you're seeing in real time the contraction of the left as they work to rein in their rogue elements. 

Identity politics are fine so long as the standard is applied equally. What is *not* ok is to say it's great for Hispanics, blacks, Asians, and Jews to work toward collective interest, but demonize whites for doing the same in their own countries and ethnic homelands.

In my own experience getting the Right to do ANYTHING is like pulling teeth. All anyone wants to do is bitch. When it comes to action it's almost as if somebody else will take care of it. Whether that's God, Trump or other Republicans / Conservatives. It's infuriating.

i.e. "Democrats are the real racists!"

Identity politics is clearly a winning strategy. What long lasting victory have conservatives had since 1960? That is around the time whites stopped advocating for the legitimate interests of white people, as a group. 

Leftists have gotten the Hart-Cellar Act, Desegregation, Affirmative Action, Massive increases in welfare, Roe v. Wade, among other things. The Overton window continues to shift to the left. What exactly are 'conservatives' conserving by losing the country? If whites would admit that they, as a group, have legitimate interests then we would be able to combat the lefts tribalism with our own.

body:
The success of identity politics is not the winning strategy, it is a powerful tactic that employed by those who've hit on a certain winning strategy*. Trying to counter left-wing racism with right-wing racism is a terrible idea, and will probably make things worse. Both left and right wing racism are, IMO, terrible, but you can't play them against each other like armies. They are ideas, they don't weaken each other when fighting in the same way that an army would. "The legitimate interests of white people", as you put it, are mostly the same as the legitimate interests of everyone else. If you actually are the ye-olde fashioned racist you appear to be, then you should know that it's fighting on your opponents prepared ground.  Placing them against each other "legitimizes" all the identity politics shit, and forces everyone into entrenched positions where they have to fight to the last for stupid tribalistic bullshit. 

And political affiliation is already a better predictor of people's views towards others than race, religion, or sex.

*That winning strategy was the gradual takeover of the education system, which has then gradually been worked into the takeover of almost every profession that needs a degree. The identity politics dominance springs out of the universities. The "left", for the most part, isn't thinking about identity politics like it's some weapon in war, they actually believe in the righteousness of what they're saying, it's what they've been raised on in school, with anything that might question that cut out or distorted.

body:
Er. Precisely the opposite. Conservatives aren't principled. The so-called 'conservative principles' have themselves become more progressive and left-wing over time. Opposing gay marriage used to be almost bipartisan in the 90s, was a conservative position in the 00s, and is now a scary and dangerous fringe position, even among conservatives.  
The old joke about conservatives being progressives 'doing the speed limit' comes to mind.
The right just needs to stop ceding intellectual and rhetorical ground to the left. The right insists on arguing on their terms, and 'democrats are the real racists' is the most cringy example of that.
'I don't care if you think I am racist' is by far the superior strategy.

body:
So let's keep on doing what has not been working, eh? That will show them!

What the left is doing is capitalizing on organic ethnic, racial, and cultural tensions for their benefit, while in the meantime Conservatives have been fearing being called racist. Yes, they have taken over academia and the media as well, but they use those platforms to further push people to embrace racial tensions. 

>"The legitimate interests of white people", as you put it, are mostly the same as the legitimate interests of everyone else.

What group does it benefit most to have a white majority? What other group does it benefit to perpetuate white culture? 

There is nothing wrong with having the best interests of your people in mind. In the end, the tribe will always be stronger than the individual. Minorities understand this, whites used to understand this. Tribalism is inevitable. We can either start now and restore the United States, or we can keep trying to push absolute individualism and erode away until we have no other choice but to be tribalistic.

In the end, principals matter little. What matters is winning.

body:
As a native American, fuck you go back where you came from. This was a tribal county since the beginning of man until colonialism stepped foot here. Much longer than it was a white majority that stamped out my culture. No one any longer knows my language no one understands the customs we had. My grandmother couldn't communicate with me because my father was taken from our people to " be educated" he never got to learn out language, and only found his family in his 60s. 

If you don't want the same to happen to your children than do something about it, but don't ever claim this place was historically white because that is false and was true for less than 600 years.

body:
The trouble is, if they stuck to their guns they probably wouldn't get as many votes. It's like churches panicking about losing followers hand-over-fist because the Old Testament teachings didn't really appeal to people any more, so they've all decided that Jesus loves everyone and put pride flags up every year.

Though maybe they *would* get more on board if they went more hardline. As Trump proved, people prefer a candidate who is open about their distain for certain people than a typical politician who tries to appeal to everyone and comes off disingenuous.

parent.body:
Er. Precisely the opposite. Conservatives aren't principled. The so-called 'conservative principles' have themselves become more progressive and left-wing over time. Opposing gay marriage used to be almost bipartisan in the 90s, was a conservative position in the 00s, and is now a scary and dangerous fringe position, even among conservatives.  
The old joke about conservatives being progressives 'doing the speed limit' comes to mind.
The right just needs to stop ceding intellectual and rhetorical ground to the left. The right insists on arguing on their terms, and 'democrats are the real racists' is the most cringy example of that.
'I don't care if you think I am racist' is by far the superior strategy.

body:
With culture comes ancestry, tradition, and birthright. What reason do Asians have to keep on propagating white culture? Or Blacks? Or Mexicans? Keeping America White is preserving its culture. Only Europeans can carry a European country and keep it European. America has a European legacy, it was built by Europeans and it will die when it ceases to be European. 

If China were to become majority Black do you think it would still have Chinese culture? Would you shame the Chinese people who don't want it to become black telling them that blacks can carry on the Chinese legacy just as well as a Chinese person can?

It was clear what this country was intended to be by the first naturalization laws: Only white men of good character could become citizens. Only in 1965 did the immigration laws change to allow America to be non-white with the Hart-Cellar Act. 

I will fight to maintain what I inherited from my forefathers, for their sake and for my children's sake.

body:
I think we should let people choose to do their own thing. Let people *choose to segregate themselves.* Don't legally require segregation or force people to mix. 

Some people are more focused on other people's skin color and don't want to associate with them. It's best to let nature take its course and let society naturally alienate them.

Meanwhile, the decent people who see the human beneath other people's skin color will thrive because they aren't so picky about a partner's race. It's sort of a natural selection type thing.

Basically, let people do what makes them happy. If some black people and some white people become good friends regardless of their skin color and they enjoy it that way, *then let them.* But don't force some racist KKK guy to assimilate. Let him go stay in his lonely shack in the forest where he won't bother anyone. It'll naturally facilitate peace.

The big problem comes when the authoritarians show up and try to force segregation or mixing. Then you have a problem on your hands.

parent.body:
I agree with most of what you're saying. The Left has been well organized and has effectively made more drastic changes in this country than the Right.

Where we disagree is the topic of desegregation. I feel segregation is the primary factor in the racism that we have left in this country. I've had black friends and been around black acquaintances my entire life. I'm not racist because was never segregated from people according to ethnicity. My grandmother on the other hand was racist. She was in her mid-60s when she told me she sat next to a black woman on a flight and was taken back by how kind the woman was. I think she even used the phrase "they're just like everyone else". My thinking was "no shit" but even at a young age I realized she was previously racist because she had no real contact with somebody with dark skin.

Likewise, Daryl Davis has made it a point to sit down at bars and talk with racists. Former Klan members come to the dude's house for dinner now. Many of them told Daryl that they were racist because they hadn't gotten to know any black people.

I'll always support desegregation. "Blacks" don't have an agenda. Black Americans are just as diverse as white Americans. To be blunt, any time you lump a large group of people together on a broad variable you're going to be wrong in your analysis.

body:
There is 3 sides to politics. Each side sees the other two as the same. There is the communist left which values equality above all. The libertarian right, which values freedom above all. And the Nationalist right that values stability above all. The communists see libertarians and nationalists as racist. The libertarians see nationalist and communists as authoritarian and the Nationalists see the communists and the libertarians as globalists.

So national socialists are right wing but slightly closer to communists than to libertarians.

*What happens when a company that is racist has a monopoly in an important industry?* 

I think the best way to prevent private enterprise from taking away choice from minorities is to set the economy up so minorities could easily make successful alternatives. (EG a racist bus company only allows whites, so blacks form their own bus company that allows all races, or just them if that's what you want).

body:
>So let's keep on doing what has not been working, eh? That will show them!

>What the left is doing is capitalizing on organic ethnic, racial, and cultural tensions for their benefit, while in the meantime Conservatives have been fearing being called racist. Yes, they have taken over academia and the media as well, but they use those platforms to further push people to embrace racial tensions.

This isn't part of some grand plan any more than the takeover of Europe by Christianity was a grand plan: it's just a group of converts doing what their ideology requires of them. Except for the spongers and sycophants who are in it for themselves(and for reasons I won't get into here, there's a lot of them, but they're still a minority), the people moving this are doing it because they really believe in what they're doing. It's not some scheme, it's not even well thought out. If it was, 

>What group does it benefit most to have a white majority? What other group does it benefit to perpetuate white culture?

>There is nothing wrong with having the best interests of your people in mind. In the end, the tribe will always be stronger than the individual. Minorities understand this, whites used to understand this.
  Tribalism is inevitable. We can either start now and restore the United States, or we can keep trying to push absolute individualism and erode away until we have no other choice but to be tribalistic.

>In the end, principals matter little. What matters is winning.


The "group" is nothing without the individuals. The group doesn't have a mind of it's own, it doesn't have thoughts, feelings, or direction, even if it might act like it does. It's an abstraction, a mental simplification for a complex situation. "White culture" or "black culture" is something that's mostly adopted, faked, or learned by those individuals.

People have much more to gain by not letting small, arbitrary differences define who they side with. That sounds really cliche, yeah, but it's not hypothetical. Believe it or not, people in all those different "tribes" used to get along a lot better 20 years ago. Now... hell, they're starting to literally speak different dialects. The ability to identify someone's tribal membership by how they're using "y'all" and "folks" isn't organic, it's the result of ideologies that seek to create, perpetuate and exaggerate differences. Like I said earlier, when it comes to predicting attitudes about the "ingroup" and "outgroup", political affiliation trumps race, sex, even religion. 

And if your "tribe" is losing, and your solution is to try and force everyone into one tribe or another, then why would I want to side with the losing tribe? Especially when their representative just declared that principles don't matter? I don't have any reason to think that your tribe will treat people any better. If the "winner" will fuck everyone else over no matter who wins, why the hell would I side with any of you?


People are starting to see that. People who used to grudgingly side with identity politics because it wasn't that *other* type of identity politics are seeing how destructive it really is. If I'm going to join a tribe, it'll be the tribe of no tribe, the where the individual actually matter. So, in response to your question: I'm going to keep doing what I've been doing. And now with many more people.
body_html:
So let's keep on doing what has not been working, eh? That will show them!

What the left is doing is capitalizing on organic ethnic, racial, and cultural tensions for their benefit, while in the meantime Conservatives have been fearing being called racist. Yes, they have taken over academia and the media as well, but they use those platforms to further push people to embrace racial tensions.

This isn't part of some grand plan any more than the takeover of Europe by Christianity was a grand plan: it's just a group of converts doing what their ideology requires of them. Except for the spongers and sycophants who are in it for themselves(and for reasons I won't get into here, there's a lot of them, but they're still a minority), the people moving this are doing it because they really believe in what they're doing. It's not some scheme, it's not even well thought out. If it was,

What group does it benefit most to have a white majority? What other group does it benefit to perpetuate white culture?

There is nothing wrong with having the best interests of your people in mind. In the end, the tribe will always be stronger than the individual. Minorities understand this, whites used to understand this. Tribalism is inevitable. We can either start now and restore the United States, or we can keep trying to push absolute individualism and erode away until we have no other choice but to be tribalistic.

In the end, principals matter little. What matters is winning.

The "group" is nothing without the individuals. The group doesn't have a mind of it's own, it doesn't have thoughts, feelings, or direction, even if it might act like it does. It's an abstraction, a mental simplification for a complex situation. "White culture" or "black culture" is something that's mostly adopted, faked, or learned by those individuals.

People have much more to gain by not letting small, arbitrary differences define who they side with. That sounds really cliche, yeah, but it's not hypothetical. Believe it or not, people in all those different "tribes" used to get along a lot better 20 years ago. Now... hell, they're starting to literally speak different dialects. The ability to identify someone's tribal membership by how they're using "y'all" and "folks" isn't organic, it's the result of ideologies that seek to create, perpetuate and exaggerate differences. Like I said earlier, when it comes to predicting attitudes about the "ingroup" and "outgroup", political affiliation trumps race, sex, even religion.

And if your "tribe" is losing, and your solution is to try and force everyone into one tribe or another, then why would I want to side with the losing tribe? Especially when their representative just declared that principles don't matter? I don't have any reason to think that your tribe will treat people any better. If the "winner" will fuck everyone else over no matter who wins, why the hell would I side with any of you?

People are starting to see that. People who used to grudgingly side with identity politics because it wasn't that other type of identity politics are seeing how destructive it really is. If I'm going to join a tribe, it'll be the tribe of no tribe, the where the individual actually matter. So, in response to your question: I'm going to keep doing what I've been doing. And now with many more people.

post.body:
i.e. "Democrats are the real racists!"

Identity politics is clearly a winning strategy. What long lasting victory have conservatives had since 1960? That is around the time whites stopped advocating for the legitimate interests of white people, as a group. 

Leftists have gotten the Hart-Cellar Act, Desegregation, Affirmative Action, Massive increases in welfare, Roe v. Wade, among other things. The Overton window continues to shift to the left. They now have started to tear down statues and prep the country for the replacement of whites by declaring American history racist.

What exactly are 'conservatives' conserving by losing the country? If whites would admit that they, as a group, have legitimate interests then we would be able to combat the lefts tribalism with our own.

body:
>This isn't part of some grand plan any more than the takeover of Europe by Christianity was a grand plan: it's just a group of converts doing what their ideology requires of them. 

I never said every liberal has been briefed on some grand plan. SImilar to Christianity, the left has been hijacked by the elites, like how Rome took over Christianity and established the Catholic Chrurch. They are dividing us by race, ethnic group, and/or culture to create a tension-filled, easily governable populace. They are able to use these things to divide us because they are emphasizing organic divisions in the country. I think we should not have allowed America to grow in a way that would allow these divisions to be there in the first place (no Hart-Cellar Act), but at this point there is not much we can do. We cannot just 'think' these divisions away. They are inevitable. Do some research into inclusive fitness to get a better picture on why homogenous countries tend to have less conflict. 

>The "group" is nothing without the individuals. The group doesn't have a mind of it's own, it doesn't have thoughts, feelings, or direction, even if it might act like it does. It's an abstraction, a mental simplification for a complex situation. 

Not sure what you are getting at here. Did I say that groups are individuals that combine into a mega-human? Just because groups consist of individuals does not mean that policies and laws cannot benefit different groups of individuals differently. And these people, whether they realize it or not, are effectivley voting for the best interests of their group. Just look at how whites vote compared to minorities: https://files.catbox.moe/9gf8o8.png You are making a distinction without a difference.

> "White culture" or "black culture" is something that's mostly adopted, faked, or learned by those individuals.

Although I agree the vast majority of culture is learned, it is also likely different races are genetically predisposed to behave in certain ways.

>People have much more to gain by not letting small, arbitrary differences define who they side with.

I agree, but as I said above this is inevitable. Even babies display racial predjudice ( https://time.com/67092/baby-racists-survival-strategy/ ). While I would like to see the multiracial society of your dreams just as much as you, it is just not worth the weakness that it exposes. America would not be having race riots if we stayed homogenous. America would not be debating whether or not to tear down monuments to our own history if we stayed homogenous. These divisions are organic, if they weren't, why do ethnic tensions arise almost every time multiple ethnicities have to share the same land.

>Like I said earlier, when it comes to predicting attitudes about the "ingroup" and "outgroup", political affiliation trumps race, sex, even religion.

Could you explain what you mean by this?

>your solution is to try and force everyone into one tribe or another, 

As I said previously, everyone will be forced to choose a tribe eventually. My suggestion is more proactive, but if we just continue on our current path, the Marxists will choose for you.

>then why would I want to side with the losing tribe?  

That is why race is powerful, and ethnicity even more so. You have a vested genetic interest in ensuring that your ethnicity thrives and is perpetuated. You seem the type to rise above your lizard brain and use more logic than the average person, so this probably has no impact on you. However the closer Whites get to replacement, the stronger their lizard brains will call to them to take action. Most likely in the form of nationalism.

>Especially when their representative just declared that principles don't matter?

You misunderstand me when I say that principals don't matter. They do matter. They are also, however, a luxury, and one that conservatives cannot afford at the moment. If I had to choose between honoring my principals and saving my country, I would choose saving my country every time. What good are principals when the system that allows those principals to exist is destroyed?

>I don't have any reason to think that your tribe will treat people any better. If the "winner" will fuck everyone else over no matter who wins, why the hell would I side with any of you?

Again, assuming you are white: You have a vested interest in maintaining the wellbeing of your ethnicity. If you truly think that both sides will be equally bad, mind as well choose the side that does not want your wealth redistributed and your family dead.

>People are starting to see that. People who used to grudgingly side with identity politics because it wasn't that other type of identity politics are seeing how destructive it really is.

Not sure what world you are living in. People are becoming more radicalized than ever. Remember what this website is? A refuge for people who get banned at the slightest inkling of political dissidence. Google, Facebook, Amazon, Twitter, Snapchat, and the Mainstream Media are all pushing for radicalization. 

>If I'm going to join a tribe, it'll be the tribe of no tribe, the where the individual actually matter. 

I wish that would work. The only way individualism can work is if the system which allows individualism to thrive is placed at a higher priority than the individual. What good are individualist principals when the system that allows those principals to exist is destroyed? Absolute Individualism is easily subverted and overtaken.

Individualism is an ideology that was thought up by white men for white men, and it shows. Individualism disproportionatley benefits white men, among other groups (Asians and Jews also do well). Other groups (women, blacks, hispanics) see this and they think that the system is rigged in our favor. We know it is not. We know they could do just as well if they acted like us. If they acted like white men. White men like meritocracies because we thrive in meritocracies. What we cannot do is forget the conditions which allow meritocratic societies to thrive: Homogeneity and White Culture.
